Package it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.event.modelview

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardAddPlayerUpdate
    Event sent when a player is added to the game board.
    BoardHasAmmoCardsUpdate
    Event indicating whether the board has ammo cards left in the stack.
    BoardHasWeaponsUpdate
    Event indicating whether the board has weapons left in the stack.
    BoardKillShotsUpdate
    Event sent when the list of kill shots in the game board is updated.
    BoardRemovePlayerUpdate
    Event sent when a player is removed from the game board.
    BoardSetSquareUpdate
    Event sent when a board square is set.
    BoardSkullsUpdate
    Event sent when the maximum number of killshots for the game is set.
    BoardStatusUpdate
    Event sent when the status of the board is updated.
    CurrentPlayerUpdate
    Event sent when the player currently playing its turn changes.
    DominationBoardDamagesUpdate
    Event sent when the list of damages in the domination board is updated.
    EnemyPowerUpUpdate
    Event sent when the number of powerUps of a player changes.
    EnemyWeaponUpdate
    Event sent when the number or status of weapons of a player changes.
    OwnPowerUpUpdate
    Event sent when the list of powerUps of a player changes.
    OwnWeaponUpdate
    Event sent when the list of weapons of a player changes.
    PlayerAmmoUpdate
    Event sent when the list of weapons of a player changes.
    PlayerDamagesTagsUpdate
    Event sent when the list of tags or weapons of a player changes.
    PlayerDeathUpdate
    Event sent when a player is killed.
    PlayerFrenzyUpdate
    Event sent when a player triggers Final Frenzy.
    PlayerKillScoreUpdate
    Event sent when the kill score of a player is updated.
    PlayerMasterUpdate
    This event informs players about the color the master player (the game creator).
    PlayerPositionUpdate
    Event sent when the position of a player is updated.
    PlayerScoreUpdate
    Event sent when the score of a player is updated
    PlayerStatusUpdate
    Event sent when the status of a player changes.
    SquareAmmoCardUpdate
    Event sent when the ammo card on a square is updated.
    SquareWeaponUpdate
    Event sent when the list of weapons on a spawn point is updated.
